document_data.name: House of Tears
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Tears''' was the temple to [[Ilmater]] in the city of [[Zazesspur]] in [[Tethyr]]. It also contained the chapter house for the [[Order of Ilmater's Brethren]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the [[Zazesspur/High City/Market District|Market District]] of the [[Zazesspur/High City|High City]].
document_data.Structure: The chapter house for the Order of Ilmater's Brethren was a three-story building built in the [[Tashalar]]an style. It was kept in pristine condition.
document_data.Interior: The chapter house was lit with [[lantern]]s. The light from these illuminated a [[stained glass]] window that depicted Ilmater's bound hands on a field of yellow. It contained a healing chamber with a [[marble]] examination table. The complex was large enough to hold 60 [[cleric]]s and 200 other worshipers of Ilmater.
document_data.Services: The chapter house offered healing and [[Afterlife#Resurrection|resurrection]] services.
document_data.Inhabitants: The brothers at the complex were led by Father [[Akkar Donatus]], who led the faithful there in daily rituals.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, [[Zaranda Star]] visited the chapter house, hoping that her friend Father [[Pelletyr]] could be resurrected. She was informed, however, that members of the Order of Ilmater's Brethren took oaths forbidding such [[divine magic]].
